snippet: Coach America, one of the country's biggest bus operators, said that its decision to file for Chapter 11 protection arose not from business difficulties but from the burden imposed by its big debt load.
abstract: Coach America, one of the country's biggest bus operators, said that its decision to file for Chapter 11 protection arose not from business difficulties but from the burden imposed by its big debt load.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Big Bus Operator Files for Bankruptcy
